meanings.sent1: The gobies swam swiftly in the clear water.
meanings.sent2: I saw a school of gobies near the coral reef.
meanings.sent3: The gobies played hide and seek among the rocks.
meanings.sent4: Her room was as messy as a tank full of gobies.
meanings.sent5: The colorful gobies darted around like tiny rainbows.

meanings.sent1: The gobies were displayed in a row at the aquarium.
meanings.sent2: She counted the gobies in the tank and found seven.
meanings.sent3: The gobies on the menu made the fish very happy.
meanings.sent4: The gobies in the story were as diverse as a rainbow.
meanings.sent5: The gobies in the pond seemed to shimmer in the sunlight.
